price: او پنځم ځل دا چې پر هغې دې د الله غضب وي، كه هغه سړى به له رښتينو څخه وي.
arabic: وَٱلۡخَٰمِسَةَ أَنَّ غَضَبَ ٱللَّهِ عَلَيۡهَآ إِن كَانَ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: wal-khāmisata anna ghaḍaba al-lahi ʿalayhā in kāna mina al-ṣādiqīna
